ACT
212
Measures of the probate court to secure the estate
The probate court can determine the measures to secure the estate during the entire probate procedure.
During the probate proceedings, the probate court may change and cancel the probate security measures determined by it or another court or authority.
Insurance measures, as well as their changes and cancellations, are determined by the probate court at the request of the party, also ex officio.
